pathMarks.title: Path Marks
pathMarks.tip.description: View and manage all path marks across your media libraries. Click on a path to edit marks in the config page.
pathMarks.warning.invalidPaths: {{count}} path(s) no longer exist on the file system
pathMarks.confirm.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this mark?
pathMarks.tip.clickOnFoldersToNavigate: Click on folders to navigate. Use the Add Mark button or right-click for mark options.
pathMarks.tip.syncAllMarksOnThisPath: Sync all marks on this path
pathMarks.tip.deleteAllMarksOnThisPath: Delete all marks on this path
pathMarks.tip.browseAndClickTransfer: Browse and click "Transfer here" to select destination path
pathMarks.status.aboutToDeleteMarks: You are about to delete {{count}} mark(s)
pathMarks.status.aboutToTransferMarks: You are about to transfer {{count}} mark(s)
pathMarks.checkbox.alsoDeleteChildMarks: Also delete {{count}} mark(s) from {{pathCount}} child path(s)
pathMarks.checkbox.childPathsAvailableFo: + {{count}} child path(s) with marks will also be available for transfer
pathMarks.warning.cannotTransferToSamePa: Cannot transfer to the same path
pathMarks.empty.goToConfigPage: Go to path mark config page to add marks
pathMarks.label.resourceProfileHint: Next step: Configure Resource Profiles to define enhancers, players, and other resource processing settings
